https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kYpdRj3DQq4wVxMDgXuCACEeV8F.jpg A young girl with a special gift comes of age during one of the most desolate periods in American history in this dark Dust Bowl fantasy inspired by Hans Christian Andersen's "The Little Mermaid." Charlotte's Song
